fi.ak.dungeongen.levelgenerator

Class RoomGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.ak.dungeongen.levelgenerator.RoomGenerator

  • public class RoomGenerator
extends Object
    Class generates rooms to be fitted on a level of char[][]. Each room's coordinates and dimensions are checked to see if it fits.

        public boolean doesRoomFit(MyList<Room> rooms,
                           Room room)
        Method checks that if a room fits without overlapping with other rooms. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/306316/determine-if-two-rectangles-overlap-each-other/306332#306332
        Parameters:
        rooms - all the rooms in a list.
        room - room to be checked.
        Returns:
        boolean true if room fits, false otherwise.
